skins.shipDescription: Baltimore-class heavy cruiser C Bremerton, Hull Number CA-130.
skins.selfIntroduction: We Baltimore-class girls, me included, hardly got any chances to shine in combat since we were built near the end of the war. This time 'round, though, we're always on standby! You need somethin' done, hit me up!
skins.acquisition: Here! I! Am! I'm Bremerton, the Eagle Union heavy cruiser! The pleasure's mine! Oh, by the way, mind telling me your name, birthday, and favorite thing?
skins.login: Nice seeing ya, Commander! I'll list off today's mission objectives... but first, I've gotta make a post to my Juustagram!
skins.details: One sec, gotta finish this message... There we go! You see, I offer this like, counseling service thing, so sometimes I get people messaging me like this. You need any counseling, Commander? Typing all the time's a chore, so just hit me up in-person.
skins.secretaryIdle1: You look kinda moody... Wait, is that my cue to like, go buy you a drink?
skins.secretaryIdle2: What are you like when you're not working, Commander? Maybe you're one of those serious-on-the-outside, klutz-on-the-inside people?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Is my outfit tickling your fancy, Commander? Heheh, if you wanna get a closer look, go ahead.
skins.secretaryTouch: Oof... My shoulders are killing me! Yo, Commander, mind giving me a massage?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Do that again and you'll regret it real bad, you hear?

skins.shipDescription: *pant*... *pant*... Man, it's so sunny today... Commander, or should I say, "Coach," could ya lend me your parasol? I'm starting to feel my brains melting away...
skins.acquisition: *pant*... *pant*... Man, it's so sunny today... Commander, or should I say, "Coach," could ya lend me your parasol? I'm starting to feel my brains melting away...
skins.login: *gulp* *gulp* Phew... I'm coming back to life! Coach, thanks for practicing with me all this time!
skins.details: Gah, it's freakin' hot... I just wanna hit the showers and then flop around in bed until it's time to sleep... Oh, gotta update my Juustagram... Ehh, forget it, I'm not gonna bother today.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Coach, if you're thirsty, you can take a sip from my water bottle. Don't sweat the small stuff, go for it!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Seems like Cooper is having a match with some Sakura Empire girls over on the next court. Coach, wanna go take some sports drinks over to them in a bit?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Wanna have a friendly match? Er, actually, scrap that. There's no way I'd be able to beat you, Coach.
skins.secretaryTouch: Now that I'm all sweaty and gross, I can't just ask to lean on your shoulder, can I? Ahaha...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I was an idiot for thinkin' you wouldn't try something when my guard is down...
